levels.description: Stops attacking and throws a chakram, which stops at the target location. Splash area increases, and chakram deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage to all nearby enemies and causes them to have <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed.
